DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether eight-lesson self-help intervention deliver online result reduction depressive symptom .
DOC.criteria: Participants 18 year age old , Participants regular ( > 1 time/week ) access internet email , valid email address , Participants fluent almost fluent English , Participants look information help , rather another person . Only invited participate eligible . Participants 18 year age , Participants sporadic ( < 1 time/week ) access internet email , Participants fail provide email address , Participants English difficulty , Participants look information help someone else , Participants invite ineligible .
